name: Box Pox v1.4
description:
Things you need to know before playing "Box Pox".  

1.No retry option yet, need to play the game from the starting. 

2.Might face some bugs. 

3. At last Enjoy "Lot of puzzles are waiting for you.   THANK YOU.

REQUIREMENTS :

Ram: 256Mb needed

windows 8 or10 needed

graphics: 52Mb VRAM needed

processor: intel pentium or higher, AMD Athlon or higher.
